channel.title: Missing Chapter titles, etc.
channel.description:
I get a sort of place-holder when changing chapters or any other time something is supposed to print out in front of you - such as Gordon's stats at the end of the opening tram ride.
At first I thought it was from a modified/corrupted download from a not-so-official source, but I'm still getting it after nuking and then using one of the official sites. So I'm pretty sure it's something on my end causing it. Any ideas, folks? ![bm_c0a0a0000_crop.jpg|332x184](upload://vspOmp4Qll4nzHFe4e8oAgMSAMx.jpeg)

item.title: Missing Chapter titles, etc.
item.dc:creator: Shepard
item.description:
That was my problem also, thanks for solution, Ram

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Chapter titles, etc.
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
I didn’t use the included installer, I just 7z’d it into a folder I created… called “BlackMesa” …

Welp, that sounds exactly what I did wrong. Thanks!

Read full topic
